name: Stay Safe Game Jam: Corona Blob
name_original: Stay Safe Game Jam: Corona Blob
description:
Hello friend! 

This game was developed in two days during the "stay safe" game jam: https://www.staysafejam.org/

I just recently started making games (January 2020) and actually managed to finish something that looks like a game in just 48 hours! All assets you see and hear are self-made; no assets from the asset store, no downloaded materials, the music is done with the google melody maker, all handcrafted by a German guy trying his best to make it look like a cute game.

Font used: "edirne" by  Iordanis Passas. Free for personal use.

The theme of the game jam was "SOLIDARITY". My interpretation is that we all need to play a role in slowing the spread of the corona virus through social distancing and other measures. 

Can this game be any more fun? Yes, there are a million things on my to-do list, but some I could just not include because my skills in C# are still low. If you see anything that might be a feature, sorry to disappoint you, it is more likely a bug that I tried to hide :)

Stay healthy and please give tips and tricks.
Drop me a tweet: @420Misterg

misterG, 29-03-2020
